TopicTitle: A mod that allows for clamshell fairings.

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

 I was wondering if there was a mod that allows the stock fairings to open correctly? As they are at the moment they are actually a danger to the craft I am building..

 Thanks!

MJ

I don't know of any such mods, sorry.

You said that they pose a danger - do the fairings actually cause damage to other parts? I thought they were just classified as debris that doesn't affect other objects. I really do wish we could get clamshell fairings though.

> 
> I don't know of any such mods, sorry.
> You said that they pose a danger - do the fairings actually cause damage to other parts? I thought they were just classified as debris that doesn't affect other objects. I really do wish we could get clamshell fairings though.

Using them as an aeroshell for a constellation type lander causes the million part fairing to strike the cargo on descent...

See [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117928-%28sort-of%29-Clamshell-Fairings?p=1883556#post1883556](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117928-%28sort-of%29-Clamshell-Fairings?p=1883556#post1883556) for what looks like the exact solution you’re seeking.
